metadata.Title: CVE-2016-10504 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Heap-based buffer overflow vulnerability in the opj_mqc_byteout function inmqc.c in OpenJPEG before 2.2.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (application crash) via a crafted bmp file.

criterions.comment: openjpeg: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
